name: NX-Activity-Log
author: tallbl0nde
description:
NX Activity Log allows you to view (slightly) more detailed play statistics than what is currently available.
No more 5 hour estimates! :D

Currently, you can view (per game and per user):
- Number of launches
- Time of first play
- Time of last play
- Total playtime (down to the minute!)

This application is fairly basic right now; a GUI is on the "horizon"!
